00061 class cViewport

00082 
00084     unsigned int getHeight() const { return (m_activeRenderingArea.top - m_activeRenderingArea.bottom); }
00085 
00087     unsigned int getWidth() const { return (m_activeRenderingArea.right - m_activeRenderingArea.left); }
00088

00121                 
00123     cGenericObject* getLastSelectedObject() { return (m_collisionRecorder.m_nearestCollision.m_object); }
00124 
00126     cTriangle* getLastSelectedTriangle() { return (m_collisionRecorder.m_nearestCollision.m_triangle); }
00127 
00129     cVector3d getLastSelectedPoint(void) { return(m_collisionRecorder.m_nearestCollision.m_globalPos); }
00130 
00132     cVector3d getLastSelectedPointNormal(void) { return(m_collisionRecorder.m_nearestCollision.m_globalNormal);}
00133 
00135     double getLastSelectedDistance(void) { return (sqrt(m_collisionRecorder.m_nearestCollision.m_squareDistance)); }
